SEARCH
Package com.sc2002.view

Class ProjectView

java.lang.Object
com.sc2002.view.ProjectView
public class ProjectView extends Object
Provides views related to BTO projects, primarily focusing on displaying projects with filtering capabilities and showing the project currently managed by a user.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    ProjectView()
    Default constructor for ProjectView.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    private void
    printPersonalProjectMenu(AppContext appContext)
    Prints a list of BTO projects managed by the current user (Manager) that match the filters currently set in the user's profile within the AppContext.
    private void
    printProjectMenu(AppContext appContext)
    Prints a list of all BTO projects that match the filters currently set in the user's profile within the AppContext.
    void
    projectManagingMenu(AppContext appContext)
    Displays information about the BTO project currently being managed by the logged-in HDB Officer or Manager.
    private void
    setFilterMenu(AppContext appContext)
    Handles the menu flow for setting or resetting the Neighborhood and Flat Type filters used for viewing projects.
    void
    viewProjectFilterableMenu(AppContext appContext)
    Displays the main menu for viewing projects, allowing users to change filters or view projects based on current filters.

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Constructor Details

    • ProjectView

      public ProjectView()
      Default constructor for ProjectView. Initializes controllers used for project viewing and filtering.

  • Method Details

    • viewProjectFilterableMenu

      public void viewProjectFilterableMenu(AppContext appContext)
      Displays the main menu for viewing projects, allowing users to change filters or view projects based on current filters. Managers have an additional option to view only the projects they manage.
      Parameters:
      appContext - The application context containing shared resources and state.

    • projectManagingMenu

      public void projectManagingMenu(AppContext appContext)
      Displays information about the BTO project currently being managed by the logged-in HDB Officer or Manager.
      Parameters:
      appContext - The application context.

    • printProjectMenu

      private void printProjectMenu(AppContext appContext)
      Prints a list of all BTO projects that match the filters currently set in the user's profile within the AppContext.
      Parameters:
      appContext - The application context.

    • printPersonalProjectMenu

      private void printPersonalProjectMenu(AppContext appContext)
      Prints a list of BTO projects managed by the current user (Manager) that match the filters currently set in the user's profile within the AppContext.
      Parameters:
      appContext - The application context.

    • setFilterMenu

      private void setFilterMenu(AppContext appContext)
      Handles the menu flow for setting or resetting the Neighborhood and Flat Type filters used for viewing projects. Updates the filter settings in the user's profile.
      Parameters:
      appContext - The application context.
